mapper.select: select role_name from user u, role r, role_user ru where u.username = #{username} and ru.user_id = u.user_id and ru.role_id = r.role_id

select u.avatar, r.role_name, u.nickname, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.is_delete, u.is_silence from user u, role r, role_user ru where u.user_id = ru.user_id and r.role_id = ru.role_id
and r.role_name like %#{userQueryVO.roleName}%
and u.nickname like %#{userQueryVO.nickname}%
